languages.text: The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it gets knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

traits.locale_text: The wielder suffers −40% less damage from psychic abilities. When the wielder suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy pushes every adjacent enemy 2 cells away. If the target fails a Toughness test, it becomes prone for 1 round. Base armour property: +30 Strength.

The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic abilities. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy pushes every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a Toughness resistance test, it gets knocked prone for 1 round. Base armour property: +30 Strength.

The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy pushes every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it gets knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

languages.text: El portador sufre un −40 % menos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} psíquicas. Cuando el portador sufre daño de una capacidad psíquica, la energía absorbida y redirigida empuja a todos los enemigos adyacentes, alejándolos 2 casillas del portador. Si el objetivo falla una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, queda {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}: +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.

When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy pushes every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it gets knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

Si el objetivo falla una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g}, queda {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Propiedad básica de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g}: +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g}.

languages.text: 装备者受到的灵能{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}降低40%。当装备者受到灵能能力伤害时，会吸收灵能攻击的能量，将周围所有敌人推开2格。如果被推开的目标未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}特性：+30{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。

When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy pushes every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it gets knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 装备者受到的灵能{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}伤害降低40%。当装备者受到灵能能力伤害时，会吸收灵能攻击的能量，将周围所有敌人推开2格。如果被推开的目标未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。 基础{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}特性：+30{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}。

languages.text: L'utilisateur subit −40 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en moins lorsqu'il est la cible de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} psychiques. Lorsqu'il subit des dégâts provoqués par une capacité psychique, l'énergie absorbée et redirigée repousse tous les ennemis adjacents à 2 cases de l'utilisateur. Si la cible échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g}, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de base : +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −40% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy pushes every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it gets knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur subit -40 % de dégâts en moins lorsqu'il est la cible de {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} psychiques. Lorsqu'il subit des dégâts provoqués par une capacité psychique, l'énergie absorbée et redirigée repousse tous les ennemis adjacents à 2 cases de l'utilisateur. Si la cible échoue à un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Résistance{/g}, elle subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Propriété d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de base : +30 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g}.

languages.text: Der Träger erleidet −40 % weniger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch psionische {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}. Wenn er durch eine psionische Fähigkeit Schaden erleidet, sorgt die absorbierte und umgeleitete Energie dafür, dass jeder angrenzende Feind 2 Felder vom Träger weggestoßen wird. Wenn das Ziel bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} scheitert, wird es {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g}, und zwar für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.

When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy pushes every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it gets knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

Wenn er durch eine psionische Fähigkeit Schaden erleidet, sorgt die absorbierte und umgeleitete Energie dafür, dass jeder angrenzende Feind 2 Felder vom Träger weggestoßen wird. Wenn das Ziel bei einer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} scheitert, wird es {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}niedergestreckt{/g}, und zwar für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g}. Grundeigenschaft {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g}: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が受けるサイキック・{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が−40%減少する。使用者がサイキック・アビリティによるダメージを受けている場合、吸収され出力先を変更されたエネルギーが、隣接する敵全員を使用者から2セル突き飛ばす。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。 . 基本{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}特性：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g} +30
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −40% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy pushes every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it gets knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が受けるサイキック・{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}によるダメージが -40%減少する。使用者がサイキック・アビリティによるダメージを受けている場合、吸収、出力先を変更されたエネルギーが、隣接する敵全員を使用者から2セル先に突き飛ばす。ターゲットが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に失敗した場合、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態になる。 基本{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}特性：{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g} +30。

languages.text: На 40% сокращает получаемый урон от псайкерских {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}. При получении урона от псайкерской способности, поглощенная и перенаправленная энергия {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} противников, находящихся на соседних клетках, на 2 клетки от персонажа. Отброшенные цели выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и при провале оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 раунд. Базовое свойство: +30 к Силе.
languages.original_text: The wearer suffers −40% less damage from psychic {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}. When the wearer suffers damage from a psychic ability, the absorbed and redirected energy {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} every adjacent enemy 2 cells away from the wearer. If the target fails a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Toughness{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}, it gets knocked {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 round. Base {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} property: +30 Strength.

traits.locale_text: На 40% сокращает получаемый урон от псайкерских {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}. При получении урона от псайкерской способности, поглощенная и перенаправленная энергия отбрасывает противников, находящихся на соседних клетках, на 2 клетки от персонажа. Отброшенные цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и при провале оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Базовое свойство: +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.

На 40% сокращает получаемый урон от псайкерских {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}. При получении урона от псайкерской способности, поглощенная и перенаправленная энергия отбрасывает противников, находящихся на соседних клетках, на 2 клетки от персонажа. Отброшенные цели выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и при провале оказываются {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуты{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Базовое свойство: +30 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}.
